description: Access and manage HubSpot CRM data including contacts, companies, and deals
author: HubSpot
content: Integrate HubSpot CRM capabilities directly into Claude for customer relationship management.

steps: Add the HubSpot server configuration with HTTP transport

installation.claudeCode: claude mcp add --transport http hubspot https://mcp.hubspot.com/anthropic

useCases: Create new deals in the pipeline

troubleshooting.issue: HTTP 429 error: rate limit exceeded on API calls
troubleshooting.solution: OAuth apps limited to 110 requests per 10 seconds per account. Wait for rate limit window to reset. Implement throttling with max 11 requests/second to stay within burst limit.

troubleshooting.issue: Search API hitting rate limit with only few requests
troubleshooting.solution: Search endpoints limited to 4 requests per second per token. Add 250ms delays between search operations. Consider caching search results to reduce API calls.
Check access token expiration (look at expires_in parameter). Re-authenticate to get new OAuth token. Verify token has correct scopes for HubSpot API access (contacts, deals, etc).

troubleshooting.issue: HTTP 403 forbidden when accessing CRM objects
troubleshooting.solution: Verify OAuth token has required scopes. Contacts access needed for contacts, content access for deals. Check account permissions in HubSpot settings and re-authenticate with correct scopes.

troubleshooting.issue: Error rate exceeds 5% causing marketplace issues
troubleshooting.solution: Reduce failed requests by implementing proper error handling. Validate input before API calls. Check API responses and fix 4xx errors in your code to lower error rate below 5%.
